p: Patients treated during the plerixafor showed a trend towards fewer apheresis sessions, lower total apheresis blood volume and less time spent on apheresis. These differences were not statistically significant (Table 2). A CD34+ collection yield of 2 × 10 6 cells/kg was achieved by 34 patients (83%) treated in the pre-plerixafor period and by 46 patients (90%) in the plerixafor era ( p = 0.74). The costs associated with apheresis decreased from €5631 to €4765 ( p = 0.07).
